page.title: 07HEALTH - DENTIST & CLINIC
page.content: {BARNTON AND LITTLE LEIGH 03600375} HEALTH 2. Dentist: 3 dentists. 3 dental nurses. 2 receptionists.Check ups, fillings, scaling - common treat- ment.Unhealthy teeth compared with National Average due to bad diet, carbohydrate.Poor area. Fluoride improved condition.Busiest time 9 - 9.30, 5 - 5.30.Most common age group: 3 - 16 and then have to pay; stop, then 22 onwards. Clinic:Services - Relaxation, parentcraft - Tues. p.m. Baby Clinic Wednesday p.m. Eye clinics. Chiropody. Visiting handicapped, schools, talks. Nurse, health visitor present. Visiting Doctor.
